original_text: But perhaps your servant will say to you, ‘I do not want to leave you!’ He may say that because he loves you and your family. He enjoys his life with you.
korean_text: 종이 만일 너와 네 집을 사랑하므로 너와 동거하기를 좋게 여겨 네게 향하여 내가 주인을 떠나지 아니하겠노라 하거든

sentences.original_text: But perhaps your servant will say to you
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 어쩌면 당신의 종이 당신에게 말할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: 'I do not want to leave you!'
He enjoys his life with you
